summary: OpenAI has launched the 4o image generation feature in ChatGPT, which is now available to all users, including free users. This feature allows users to create and customize images simply by describing their needs. Additionally, a new voice option has been introduced in ChatGPT, enhancing user interaction. The GPT-4o model has received updates that improve its ability to follow complex prompts and tackle technical problems. OpenAI is also implementing rate limits due to high engagement and GPU usage. The company is focused on evolving its policies to balance user creativity with safety, emphasizing the importance of user feedback in shaping future updates.
